title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Increasing Online Education Engagement Through H5P-Based Interactive Activities

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners design job-related social problem-solving scenarios with over 80% completion using H5P interactive activities.
Learners achieve over 70% collaboration engagement by providing peer feedback at least twice weekly in online discussion forums.
Learners use H5P-based self-assessment tools to review learning outcomes at least three times and develop improvement plans.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
